name: Apfel Project
storyline:
For eighteen years, Apfel has been troubled by a recurring dream about a little girl named Blume. Every night, she experiences Blume’s life, unable to control her thoughts but deeply connected to the girl's every move. Apfel, possibly the last human alive, holds onto these dreams as the only vestiges from a world long lost.

When a vision compels her to travel to the mountains, she sets out in search of answers.
summary: A story about a girl that needs to make her way through a hindered journey by revisiting glimpses of her former self to uncover the secrets behind her existence.
